📋 Troubleshooting Steps

  1. Start the server: npm run dev or node web-server.js web
  2. Check if server is running: Look for "Dashboard available at: http://localhost:3000" in terminal
  3. Test API endpoints: Use the buttons above to test each endpoint
  4. Check browser console: Press F12 and look for JavaScript errors
  5. Clear browser cache: Press Ctrl+F5 to force refresh
